body.name: VINCI Cold Brew 360, 1.4 L Cold Brew Maker/Brewer Featuring Patented Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: What Makes the Vinci Cold Brew 360 Different? The Vinci Cold Brew 360 features a unique, patented dual filter system that allows water to permeate the grounds from both inside and outside the coffee grounds. This dual-action steeping process results in a faster and more robust flavor extraction. The Vinci 360 Cold Brew is not only faster it is also more efficient at saturating the grounds in comparison to other similar brewers. Better extraction means a smoother, more flavorful coffee, thanks to our new patented Dual Filter 360 Technology.

Easy to Use and Clean: The Vinci Cold Brew 360 is designed to be user-friendly, making it easy for anyone to make delicious cold brew coffee at home. Simply add room-temperature water and your favorite coffee grounds and let it steep for 8-24 hours, and voila! A perfect batch of cold brew is ready. And when it comes to cleaning, the dual filter system is a breeze to disassemble and clean.
Generous Capacity: The Vinci Cold Brew 360 ensures you'll have plenty of delicious cold brew to last throughout the day. The easy-pour spout makes serving a breeze.
Compact and Convenient: Despite its large capacity, the Vinci Cold Brew 360 boasts a compact design that's easy to store and fits in virtually any refrigerator.
Brew, Serve & Store All-in-1: The Vinci Cold Brew 360 is comprehensively designed to allow you to brew, serve, and store all in one container.
Delicious Cold Brew: The Vinci Cold Brew 360's efficient brewing process results in a fuller, bolder flavor that will satisfy even the most discerning cold brew coffee drinkers.

Why Cold Brew? Cold brew coffee is known for its smooth, less acidic taste, making it a popular choice among coffee lovers. It's also highly versatile and can be enjoyed on its own or used as a base for other beverages like iced lattes or cocktails. Cold Brew coffee can also be enjoyed hot, cold, over ice, or at room temperature.

Vinci Housewares Difference: As a leader in innovative products for your kitchen, Vinci Housewares is committed to providing high-quality products that make your life easier and more enjoyable. Every Vinci Housewares product is designed by our team of US-based engineers, ensuring you get the best in quality and functionality. With the Vinci Cold Brew 360, we're revolutionizing how you make cold brew coffee at home. Try it out for yourself and taste the difference!
Save Money: By making your cold brew at home with the Vinci Cold Brew 360, you can save money on pricey coffee shop drinks. Plus, you can customize the flavor and strength to your liking.

The Perfect Valentine's Day Gift: Know someone who loves cold brew? The Vinci Cold Brew 360 is a unique and heartfelt gift choice that will be cherished by any coffee enthusiast! For him and for her. Ideal for new parents, teens, wives, husbands, and more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Discover the Vinci Cold Brew 360 - a revolutionary addition to the world of coffee brewing that redefines the art of making cold brew at home. Featuring our unique Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology, the Vinci Cold Brew 360 ensures maximum flavor extraction in just half the typical brewing time.

Why The Vinci 360 Cold Brew Is Faster Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology Experience the new age of cold brew coffee with the Vinci Cold Brew 360. This game-changing brewing system, equipped with our unique Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology, whips up cold brew up to 50% faster than traditional methods, delivering a quick and potent extraction of flavors to satisfy even the most particular cold brew aficionados.

Discover the world of homemade cold brew coffee with Vinci Cold Brew 360 in just 4 simple steps: 1. Pour room-temperature water into the Vinci Cold Brew 360's carafe. 2. Add 7-8 scoops of medium-grind coffee 3. Steep your brew for 8-24 hours 4. Serve and enjoy the rich, full-bodied flavor

Vinci Cold Brew 360 Getting Started Going Through the Parts of the Vinci Cold Brew 360 This video will walk you through all the parts included with the Vinci Cold Brew 360. Vinci Cold Brew 360 Getting Started How to Assemble your Vinci Cold Brew 360 This video will show you how to assemble your Vinci Cold Brew 360. Vinci Cold Brew 360 Getting Started How To Make Cold Brew Coffee with the Vinci Cold Brew 360 This video will show you how to make cold brew coffee with the Vinci Cold Brew 360. Vinci Cold Brew 360 Getting Started Cleaning Your Vinci Cold Brew 360 This video will walk you through how to clean your Vinci Cold Brew 360.

Cold Brew & Iced Coffee What is the difference? Let's start by understanding the difference in their preparation. Iced coffee is hot-brewed coffee that's cooled and poured over ice, resulting in a diluted taste. In contrast, cold brew coffee is made by steeping coffee grounds for 8-24 hours in water at room temperature. This slow extraction process creates a concentrated coffee that's less acidic, richer in flavor, and has a higher caffeine level. Cold Brew can be served over ice, straight from the fridge, or in café-style drinks.

What is the Vinci Cold Brew 360? The Vinci Cold Brew 360 is a revolutionary cold brew coffee maker that features our unique Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology. It provides a rich, full-bodied cold brew flavor in half the typical brewing time. How long does the Vinci Cold Brew 360 take to brew coffee? The Vinci Cold Brew 360 can brew coffee in as little as 8 hours, which is half the typical brewing time for cold brews. What type of coffee grind should I use with the Vinci Cold Brew 360? We recommend using medium-grind coffee for optimal flavor extraction. This is also called "drip grind" and is the typical coffee you find at your local grocer. How many scoops of coffee do I need for the Vinci Cold Brew 360? For an even flavor extraction, we suggest adding 7-8 scoops of medium-grind coffee. What type of water should I use with the Vinci Cold Brew 360? We recommend using room-temperature filtered water for brewing.

Can I make tea in my Vinci Cold Brew 360? Yes absolutely the Vinci Cold Brew 360 can also be used to brew tea as well. How long will my Cold Brew stay fresh? A batch of Cold Brew will stay fresh in the fridge for up to 10 days. Does the Vinci Cold Brew 360 require electricity? No, the Vinci Cold Brew 360 does not require electricity to function. What if I have more questions? Our US based team is here and ready to help with any product questions or concerns! What makes Vinci Cold Brew 360 different from other cold brew makers? The Vinci Cold Brew 360 stands out for its Dual Filter 360 Brewing Technology, and quick brewing time. While traditional cold brew makers take 18-24 hours to achieve a fully brewed cold brew, the Vinci Cold Brew is fully extracted in just 8 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tasting Coffe
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buy for anyone who loves cold brew. The quality is great, the coffee tastes great and it's ready so fast. The maker is so easy to use also, so happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible freaking cold brew!
reviews.reviewText: We have an old school cold brew pitcher we got from Macy’s and it’s so annoying to clean! I opened this immediately & used our cold brew coffee grounds. It has such a rich flavor & it took HALF the time! The clean up was so quick too. It comes with easy to follow instructions & a little scooper. So happy with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely loved this product. It was really easy to use and easy to clean. It made some really nice cold brew, will definitely be using it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for price
reviews.reviewText: Works well, just use the right beans and give it ample time and the cold brew will be satisfactory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality - Works Great
reviews.reviewText: I have used my new cold brew 2 times now and am really happy with it. Super easy to use and makes great coffee. I bought this because of the internal filter tube that allows the grounds to be exposed to the water from the inside and outside of the main filter. It really seems to work because the coffee grounds were wet all the way through. Good job on this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: We love this cold brew maker. It's super easy to use and the coffee comes out super smooth and yummy. This is way tastier than buying premade cold brew from the grocery store and way cheaper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, not alot of parts & great price!
reviews.reviewText: No more expensive Coffee shop cold brews for me. I love this Vinci Cold brew. I had delicious cold brew in 8 hours and the coffee is so clear. Does not have alot of parts that are hard to put together, and its easy to clean. GREAT price for a gift for the coffee lover in your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delicious bold cold brew FAST!!
reviews.reviewText: Just got this cold brew 360 yesterday. Brewed it overnight & it’s true! The little filter inside really works! My coffee is strong, delicious & Fast!
